LanguageData.Gun_Energeticharpoon.label: Energetic harpoon
LanguageData.Gun_Energeticharpoon.description: Improved harpoon, still shooting metal arrows, but further accelerated energy camera, which turns a simple harpoon in the awl death

LanguageData.Gun_TrashGun.label: TrashGun
LanguageData.Gun_TrashGun.description: Massive weapon, which is based on a magnetic accelerator. It shoots magnetic bombs: balls with a powerful magnet inside, surrounded by various metal debris, which, when dropped, scatter in different directions with great speed.
LanguageData.Gun_TrashGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_TrashGun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: trashGun
